Meanings: Take Survey, operations' abbreviations which usually Companymans write in their daily drilling reports
اختصار در مورد عملیاتی است که در حال انجام است و در گزارش‌ها مورد استفاده قرار می‌گیرد
Running pipe or tubing and landing it on a downhole tool
A pipe run in a well blow a packer
. A pipe used to exhaust gases from the muffler of an engine to the outside atmosphere
Guiding a downhole tool into the wellbore or up onto the rig floor
عملیات جهت اندازه گیری شیب یا سایر پارامترهای درون چاه در حال حفاری
معمولا اختصار این لغت در مورد عملیاتی بکار میرود که در حال انجام است و در گزارش‌ها مورد استفاده قرار می‌گیرد
T/S, operations' abbreviations which usually Companymans write in their daily drilling reports
To measure and record length of pipe of tubing
tn, brownish yellow, suntan, burned with Sunshine
The person who measures a tank to determine the volume it holds at ¼" intervals of height
A tool for forming an internal screw thread. It consists of a hardened tool
steel male screw grooved longitudinally so as to have cutting edges
. A hole or opening in a line or vessel into which a gauge or valve may be inserted and screwed tight
v : 1. To form a female thread by means of a tap
. Extract or cause to flow by means of a borehole, e.g., to tape a reservoir

A tap with a gradually decreasing diameter from the top. It is used to retrieve a hollow fish such as a drill collar and is the male counterpart of a die collar. The taper tap is run into a hollow fish and rotated to cut enough threads to provide a finn grip and permit the fish to be pulled and recovered. See also : Tap. Compare also with : Die Collar
Drill Pipe, Tubing, Sucker Rods, and so forth with the diameter near the top of the Well larger than the diameter below
A bull plug or blind flange at the end of a tee to prevent erosion at a point where change in flow direction occurs
diameter Pipe that is run into a Well to serve as a Conduit for the passage of Oil and Gas to the surface
کل عمق نفوذ در سازند جهت مغزه گیری
Total Depth, or Final Depth of Well
عمق نهایی چاه یا عمقی که در برنامە حفاری چاه در نظر گرفته شده است
Top Drive System, work on, e.g. for repair

A device similar to a Power Swivel that is used in place of the Rotary Table on a Drilling Rig to turn the Drill Stem. Hung from the Hook of the Traveling Block, a Top Drive also suspends the Drill Stem in the Hole and includes Power Tongs. Modern Top Drives combine Elevators, Tongs, Swivel and Hook

سیستم دکل حفاری که از بالا چرخش به آن اعمال می‌شود. گاهی اوقات این اختصار جهت انجام کار تعمیراتی روی تاپ درایو بکار می‌رود و اختصاری است در مورد عملیاتی که در حال انجام است و در گزارش‌ها مورد استفاده قرار می‌گیرد
THERMAL DECAY TIME, Log Curve name

A portable mast that an be erected as a unit, usually by a tackle that hoists the wireline or by hydraulic pistons. The upper section of a telescoping derrick is generally nested telescoped inside the lower section of the structure and raised to full height either by the wireline or by a hydraulic system
A Sub with a telescoping joint used in dual or triple completions for running additional tail pipe
A retrievable or drillable packer in which sufficient pipe weight is not available to set the tool in compression

All operation necessary to enable the well to discharge : from the rig up of the equipment for Well test to rig down, Operations' abbreviation which usually Companymans write in their daily drilling reports
TST, operations' abbreviations which usually Companymans write in their daily drilling reports
خاصیت ظاهری سنگ از قبیل شکل و اندازە ذرات سنگ و نیزجهت قرار گیری دانه ها
گرد شدگی و نیز وجود تخلخل درون سنگ
Lost time due to Tools Failture down hole or surface . mainly service Company`s tools, Operations' abbreviation which usually Companymans write in their daily drilling reports
منطقه ای که تمامی جریان از آن محل است
برای باریک شدگی چاه بکار می‌رود
Lost time due to Tight Hole, Operations' abbreviation which usually Companymans write in their daily drilling reports

Any free Neutron, one that is not bound within an atomic nucleus that has an average energy of motion, Kinetic energy corresponding to the average energy of the particles of the ambient materials. Relatively slow and of low energy, Thermal Neutrons exhibit properties, such as large cross sections in fission, that make them desirable in
همینطور به لغت تیوبینگ مراجعه نمایید
بیشتر مواقع در مورد ضخامت سنگ یا سازند بکار برده می‌شود
A Formation that absorbs drilling fluid as it is circulated in the well. Lost circulation is caused by a Thief Formation. Also called : a Thief Sand or a Thief Zone
A Formation that absorbs drilling fluid as it is circulated in the well. Lost circulation is caused by a Thief Zone. Also called : a Thief Sand or a Thief Formation

The property exhibited by a fluid that is in a liquid state when flowing and in a semisolid, gelled state when at rest. Most drilling fluids must be thixotropic so that cuttings will remain in suspension when circulation is stopped
A metal or plastic device that is screwed onto or into pipe threads to protect 5them from damage when the pipe is not in use
A Stand of Pipe made up or three joints and handled as a unit. Compare with : Double, Fourable, and Single
The Monkey Board which has elevation equal to three Drilling Pipes
سکوی دکلبان که به بلندی سه طول شاخه لوله‌های حفاری است
Any equipment designed to be pumped down a completed well to effect a repair, modify the well's flow, or for other reasons

The top of the String of Tubing with control and flow Valves attached. Similar in design and function to the Casinghead, the Tubing Head supports the String of Tubing in the Well, seals off pressure between Casing and the inside of the Tubing, and provides connections at the surface to control the production of the Gas or Oil
A device to which a guy wire or brace may be attached, such as the anchoring device for the deadline of a hoisting
برای باریک شدگی چاه بکار می‌رود
bearing Formation of relatively low porosity and permeability
To add oil to a system, which causes the oil to break out and rise to the surface
Time actually spent for Tripping BHA In Hole from surface to TD, Operations' abbreviation which usually Companymans write in their daily drilling reports
ta, brownish yellow, suntan, burned with Sunshine
بجای آن علامت «/» نیز بکار می‌رود
جایی که بالاترین بخش لاینر قرار دارد

The large wrenches used to make up or break out drill pipe, casing, tubing, or other pipe; variously called casing tongs, pipe tongs, and so forth, according to the specific use. Power tongs are pneumatically or hydraulically operated tools that serve to spin the pipe up tight and, in some instances, to apply the final makeup torque
The Tool Man; a Packer Hand; a Service Company Hand

A heavy coupling element for drill pipe. It is made of special ahoy steel and has coarse, tapered threads and seating shoulders designed to sustain the weight of the drill stem, withstand the strain of frequent coupling and uncoupling, and provide a leakproof seal. The male section of the joint, or the pin, is attached to one end of a length of drill pipe, and the female section, or box, is attached to the other end. The tool joint may be welded to the end of the pipe, screwed on, or both. A hard
metal facing is often applied in a band around the outside of the tool joint to enable it to resist abrasion from the walls of the Borehole
بیشتر مواقع بعنوان رییس دستگاه از او یاد می‌شود که اداره کل دکل با وی است
بیشتر مواقع بعنوان رییس دستگاه از او یاد می‌شود که اداره کل دکل با وی است
An employee of a drilling contractor who is in charge of the entire drilling crew and the drilling rig. Also called : a Drilling Foreman, Rig Manager, Rig Superintendent, or Rig Supervisor
A drillable tool configuration allowing the opening of formation pressure, during drillout, prior to cutting through the tools slips
TDS, work on, e.g. : for repair, operations' abbreviations which usually Companymans write in their daily drilling reports
سیستم دکل حفاری که از بالا چرخش به آن اعمال می‌شود. معمولا اختصار این لغت در مورد عملیاتی بکار میرود که در حال انجام است
بطور مثال انجام کار تعمیراتی بر روی آن و در گزارش‌ها مورد استفاده قرار می‌گیرد
بالاترین بخش سیمان سخت شده درون چاه
جایی که بالاترین بخش لاینر قرار دارد
To fill a Well up to the surface
A component of a packer to which the tubing is connected
The turning force that is applied to a shaft or other rotary mechanism to cause it to rotate or tend to do so. Torque is measured in units of length and force, footpounds, newton

A hydraulic device connected between an engine and a mechanical load such as a compound. Torque converters are characterized by an ability to increase output torque as the load causes a reduction in speed. Torque converters are used on mechanical rigs that have compounds
کل عمق نفوذ در سازند جهت مغزه گیری
عمق نهایی چاه یا عمقی که در برنامە حفاری چاه در نظر گرفته شده است
منطقه ای که تمامی جریان از آن محل است
A working shift for drilling crew or other oilfield workers. The most common tour is 8 hours; the three daily tours are called daylight, evening or afternoon , and graveyard or morning . Sometimes
hour tours are used, especially on offshore rigs; they are called simply day tour and night tour, pronounced tower
Time actually spent for Tripping BHA Out of hole from TD to surface, Operations' abbreviation which usually Companymans write in their daily drilling reports
فشار تیوبینگ یا لوله مغزی هنگام بسته بودن دهانە چاه
که برای کم بودن سنگی در‌تری نمونه‌های حفاری شده بکار میرود
Training, operations' abbreviations which usually Companymans write in their daily drilling reports
اختصار در مورد عملیاتی که در حال انجام است و در گزارش‌ها مورد استفاده قرار می‌گیرد
که برای کم بودن سنگی در‌تری نمونه‌های حفاری شده بکار میرود
TRA, operations' abbreviations which usually Companymans write in their daily drilling reports
معمولا اختصار این لغت در مورد عملیاتی بکار میرود که در حال انجام است و در گزارش‌ها مورد استفاده قرار می‌گیرد
در مورد سنگ یا کانی بکار میرود که سمت دیگر آنرا می‌توان دید
A hydrocarbon trap in which petroleum accumulates in the top of an anticline
An arrangement of Pulleys, or Sheaves, through which drilling line is reeved and which moves up and down in the Derrick or Mast. See also : Block
A vessel in which oil is treated for the removal of S&W or other objectionable substances by the addition of chemicals, heat, electricity, or all three
A tubular device employed as an isolation tool inside the Christmas tree, to increase the tree's pressure rating during stimulation
Trip, operations' abbreviations which usually Companymans write in their daily drilling reports
عملیاتی شامل لوله بالا و لوله پایین بصورت سریع
اختصار در مورد عملیاتی است که در حال انجام است و در گزارش‌ها مورد استفاده قرار می‌گیرد
TRI, operations' abbreviations which usually Companymans write in their daily drilling reports
پیمایش کوتاه چاه شامل: لوله بالا و لوله پایین سریع
The operation of hoisting the drill stem from and returning it to the wellbore. v: shortened form of : Make a Trip

Gas that enters the wellbore when the mud pump is shut down and pipe is being pulled from the wellbore. The gas may enter because of the reduction in bottomhole pressure when the pump is shut down, because of swabbing, or because of both
The small amount of additional mud weight carried over that needed to balance formation pressure to overcome the pressure
reduction effects caused by swabbing when a trip out of the hole is made
A small mud tank with a capacity of 10 to 15 barrels, usually with

barrel divisions, used to ascertain the amount of mud necessary to keep the wellbore full with the exact amount of mud that is displaced by drill pipe. When the bit comes out of the hole, a volume of mud equal to that which the drill pipe occupied while in the hole must be pumped into the hole to replace the pipe. When the bit goes back in the hole, the drill pipe displaces a certain amount of mud, and a trip tank can be used again to keep track of this volume
The operation of hoisting the drill stem out of and returning it to the wellbore. See also : Make a Trip
در مورد سنگ یا کانی بکار میرود که طرف دیگر آنرا می‌توان دید
TRT, anything cause trouble and stop working on Rig, operations' abbreviations which usually Companymans write in their daily drilling reports
مقدار زمان در دکل حفاری که مشکل وجود داشته و جزو وقت تلف شده بحساب می‌آید
معمولا اختصار این لغت در مورد عملیاتی بکار میرود که در حال انجام است و در گزارش‌ها مورد استفاده قرار می‌گیرد

Lost time due to Excessive Torque. This might not be a Lost time code rather than a problem, which has been experienced. If torque were experienced, however it does not have to cause a lost time. It can be recorded as an experience practices only, Operations' abbreviation which usually Companymans write in their daily drilling reports
Trouble Time, operations' abbreviations which usually Companymans write in their daily drilling reports
مقدار زمان در دکل حفاری که مشکل وجود داشته و جزو وقت تلف شده بحساب می‌آید
معمولا اختصار این لغت در مورد عملیاتی بکار میرود که در حال انجام است و در گزارش‌ها مورد استفاده قرار می‌گیرد
Testing, operations' abbreviations which usually Companymans write in their daily drilling reports
اختصار در مورد عملیاتی است که در حال انجام است و در گزارش‌ها مورد استفاده قرار می‌گیرد
testing, also write as : TST for operations
diameter pipe that is run into a well to serve as a conduit for the passage of oil and gas to the surface
A device that holds the lower end of a tubing string in place by means of slips, used to prevent tubing movement when no packer is present
An arrangement of slips and packing rings used to suspend tubing from a tubing head
A flanged fitting that supports the tubing string, seals off pressure between the casing and the outside of the tubing, and provides a connection that supports the Christmas tree
همینطور به لغت تیوبینگ مراجعه نمایید
جهت اطلاعات بیشتر به لغت اسپول مراجعه فرمایید
The act of pulling tubing out of and running it back into a Well
فشار تیوبینگ یا لولە مغزی بهنگام بسته بودن چاه
Slips designed specifically to be used with tubing
A device used with slips to prevent tubing from falling into the hole when a joint of pipe is being unscrewed and racked
A mechanically operated tubing rotation valve u used to shut off formation pressure above a packer, thus testing all connections form the packer to the tree
Large wrenches used to break out and make up tubing. They may be operated manually, hydraulically, or pneumatically

A method of producing a well in which only production casing is set through the pay zone, with no tubing or inner production string used to bring formation fluids to the surface. This type of completion has its best application in low
Any kind of pipe. Oilfield tubular goods include Tubing, Casing, Drill Pipe, and Line Pipe

A fine, very hard, gray crystalline powder, a compound of Tungsten and Carbon. This compound is bonded with Cobalt or Nickel in cemented Carbide compositions and used for cutting tools, abrasives, and dies

A Downhole Motor that rotates a Bit by the action of the drilling Mud on turbine blades built into the tool. When a turbodrill is used, rotary motion is imparted only at the Bit; therefore, it is unnecessary to rotate the drill stem. Although straight Holes can be drilled with the tool, it is used most often in directional drilling

A drilling contract that calls for the payment of a stipulated amount to the drilling contractor on completion of the Well. In a Turnkey contract, the contractor furnishes all material and labor and controls the entire drilling operation, independent of operator supervision. A Turnkey contract does not, as a rule, include the completion of a Well as a producer
TRUE VERTICAL DEPTH, Log Curve name
A complete break in pipe caused by metal fatigue. v: to break something in two or to break apart, such as the head of a Bolt or the Drill Stem
خاصیت ظاهری سنگ از قبیل شکل و اندازە ذرات سنگ و نیزجهت قرار گیری دانه ها
گرد شدگی و نیز وجود تخلخل درون سنگ
